## DateConvertPipe.transform() method

Transforms value into date object

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
transform(value: TDate | DateValue, parseFormat?: string): TDate | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | TDate \| [DateValue](./datetime.datevalue.md) | value to be transformed |
|  parseFormat | string | format used for parsing string date |

<b>Returns:</b>

TDate \| null
